name: Fischer RCS Skate Boots - Unisex
description: Transfer your energy into forward motion. These stiff boots suit fitness skiers and anyone testing out the racing scene. The chassis' firm material transfers your power efficiently with good torsional control. Their solid in-step support adds stability, making each stride longer and more powerful. And with a hinged cuff, you'll find loads of lateral support without limiting your freedom of motion.Triple F waterproof-breathable membrane releases extra heat and keeps your feet dry.High hinged polymer cuff with Velcro fastener supports your push off.Speed lock pull lace system securely holds your foot back.Zippered lace cover sheds snow, melt and ice while you ski.Fischer Fresh antimicrobial treatment prevents odour build up.Comfort Guard insulation adds warmth in the forefoot and toe box.Fischer Fresh antimicrobial treatment fights odours.Injected exterior heel cap fits securely.Pull loops make on/off easy.Turnamic Pebax race sole provides stiffness and torsional control.Performance ready stiff to medium flex.Compatible with Turnamic/NNN/Prolink bindings.
